0:
Do I really look like a guy with a plan? 
You know what I am? 
I am a dog chasing cars.
I wouldn't know what to do with one if I cought it.
I just DO things.
2:
It's the slow knife
The knife that takes its time
The knife that waits years without forgetting, then slips quietly between the bones...
That's the knife that cuts deepest
3:
It's not who you are underneath 
It's what you do that defines you
4:
He's the hero Gotham deserves
He's a silent guardian,
a watchful protector.
A DARK KNIGHT
5:
- Why do we fall, Sir?
 - So that we can learn to pick Ourselves up.
6:
You either die a hero
Or live long enough 
to become the villain
7:
- My mother warned me about getting into cars with strange men
- This isn't car
8:
You do not fear death.
You think this makes you strong.
It makes you weak.
How can you move faster than possible, 
fight longer than possible, 
without the most powerful impulse of the spirit - 
The fear of death.
9: I seek the means to fight injustice, to turn fear against those who prey on the fearful
10: I'm whatever Gotham needs me to be
11: You'll hunt me. You'll condemn me. Set the dogs on me. Because that's what needs to happen. Because sometimes... the truth isn't good enough. Sometimes people deserve more. Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded"
12: He's a symbol that we don't have to be afraid of scum like you
13:
Victory has defeated you. 
Peace has cost you your strength.
14: Mister Wayne, if you don't want to tell me exactly what you're doing, when I'm asked, I don't have to lie. But don't think of me as an idiot.
15: Your compassion is a weakness your enemies will not share
16:
All you care about is money.
This city deserves a better class of criminal.
And I'm gonna give it to them
17:
As a man
I'm flesh and blood
I can be ignored
I can be destroyed
But as a symbol
I can be incorruptible 
I can be everlasting

Bats frighten me. It's time my enemies shared my dread
18: I'm gonna show the people of Gotham their city doesn't belong to the criminals and the corrupt
19: A hero. Not the hero we deserved but the hero we needed. Nothing less than a knight - shining
20: Endure Master Wayne. Take it. They'll hate you for it, but that's the point of the Batman. He can be the outcast. He can make the choice that no one else can make. The right choice.
21: You wouldn't say anything to me nor me to you. But we'd both know that you'd made it - that you were happy
